tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE baseball_games (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_date DATE,
    winning_team VARCHAR(50),
    losing_team VARCHAR(50),
    winning_score INT,
    losing_score INT,
    mvp_name VARCHAR(100),
    key_plays TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE baseball_games (
 game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 date DATE,
 home_team VARCHAR(50),
 away_team VARCHAR(50),
 home_score INT,
 away_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE baseball_games (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_date DATE,
    home_team VARCHAR(50),
    away_team VARCHAR(50),
    home_score INT,
    away_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE game_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    mvp VARCHAR(100),
    key_play TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES baseball_games(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    team VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE games (
  game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  game_date DATE,
  game_location VARCHAR(255),
  winning_team VARCHAR(50),
  losing_team VARCHAR(50),
);

CREATE TABLE plays (
  play_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  game_id INT,
  player_id INT,
  play_description TEXT,
  play_result VARCHAR(255),
);
